title: .09 Our Military Is Drowning In Data
description: Our military collects terabytes and terabytes of data every day. Is the drone-driven obsession with tactical information preventing a conversation about the morality of war?

itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, ESPN, Jody Avirgan
